Highlight Hugo Code

21 February, 2019
  • add highlight to Hugo.

Step

  • add behind code into config.toml

    # use Chroma for syntax highlight
pygmentsCodeFences = true
pygmentsCodefencesGuessSyntax = true
pygmentsStyle = "vim"

Code Highlight Example

#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    cout << 123 << '\n';
    return 0;
}
